Detailed Description

The class to provide base infomation for helping to access Groups table.

The following example demonstrates how to use this Groups class.

 getColumn(){
     String id             = Groups::_ID();
     String title          = Groups::TITLE();
 }

 getMimeType(){
     String groupsMimeType = Groups::CONTENT_ITEM_TYPE();
 }

static const gaia::base::String gaia::content::Groups::CONTENT_ITEM_TYPE ( ) [static]

The MIME type of a single group.

static const gaia::base::String gaia::content::Groups::DATA_SET ( ) [static]

The data set within the account that this group belongs to.

This allows multiple sync adapters for the same account type to distinguish between each others' group data.

This is empty by default, and is completely optional. It only needs to be populated if multiple sync adapters are entering distinct group data for the same account type and account name.

Type: TEXT

static const gaia::base::String gaia::content::Groups::DELETED ( ) [static]

The "deleted" flag: "0" by default, "1" if the row has been marked for deletion.

When delete(Uri, String, StringArray() is called on a group, it is marked for deletion. The sync adaptor deletes the group on the server and then calls ContactResolver.delete once more, this time setting the the CALLER_IS_SYNCADAPTER query parameter to finalize the data removal.

static const gaia::base::String gaia::content::Groups::DIRTY ( ) [static]

Flag indicating that VERSION has changed, and this row needs to be synchronized by its owning account.

Type: INTEGER (boolean)

static const gaia::base::String gaia::content::Groups::FAVORITES ( ) [static]

When a contacts is marked as a favorites it will be automatically added to the groups that have this flag set, and when it is removed from favorites it will be removed from these groups.

Type: INTEGER (boolean)

static const gaia::base::String gaia::content::Groups::NOTES ( ) [static]

Notes about the group.

static const gaia::base::String gaia::content::Groups::SYSTEM_ID ( ) [static]

The ID of this group if it is a System Group, i.e.

a group that has a special meaning to the sync adapter, null otherwise.

Type: TEXT

static const gaia::base::String gaia::content::Groups::TITLE ( ) [static]

The display title of this group.

static const gaia::base::String gaia::content::Groups::VISIBLE ( ) [static]

Flag indicating if the contacts belonging to this group should bei visible in any user interface.

Allowed values: 0 and 1.
